entry.title: Samsung Galaxy S9 Tempered Glass (Full with Fingerprint Recognition)
entry.summary:
Vendor: XpressTronics
Type: Tempered Glass
Price: 0.99

  • Specially Designed For Samsung Galaxy S9 [Case Friendly], Does Not Fit For Any Other Models.
  • Edge To Edge Full Covarage, full Body Tempered Glass. Extremely high hardness: resists scratches up to 9H, Built-in anti-shatter film to protect you and your Samsung Galaxy S8 Plus - if it does break, the tempered glass breaks into small pieces that stick together, making it safer for users.
  • Precise laser cut tempered glass, rounded edges. Touchscreen Accuracy for Samsung Galaxy S8 Plus, Dust-free, fingerprint-free, one-push super easiy installation, bubble free. High-response, high-transparency, and high transparency
  • HD CLARITY with HIGH TOUCH SENSITIVITY
  • Perfect fit, High quality materials and value for Money Product

entry.title: iPad Pro 10.5 inch High Transparent Full Size Tempered Glass Screen Protector
entry.summary:
Vendor: XpressTronics
Type: Tempered Glass
Price: 2.99

  • Designed to Fit: This Screen Protector is specially designed for the Apple iPad Air 3 (10.5", 3rd Generation, 2019), iPad Pro 10.5 Inch (2017), and is compatible with the Apple Pencil.
  • Premium Quality: Our Premium Grade Tempered Glass Screen Protector is scratch-proof, resilient, crystal clear, and long-lasting. Each protector is custom fit for optimum screen protection. Our protector absorbs damage from daily wear and tear and has an oleo-phobic coating that reduces fingerprints and smudges.
  • Precise Fit: laser cut openings for the front-facing camera, speaker, and home button.
  • What You Get: Includes 1 Screen protector, dust removal stickers, wet and dry wipes, and a squeegee to help remove bubbles.

entry.title: iPad Pro 11 inch High Transparent Full Size Tempered Glass Screen Protector
entry.summary:
Vendor: XpressTronics
Type: Tempered Glass
Price: 2.99

  • COMPATIBLE WITH: HD tempered glass for iPad Pro 11 inch provides ultimate screen protection for your new iPad against scratches, scrapes, and minor drops. Enjoy your iPad’s amazing Liquid Retina display with no worries!
  • ULTRA-CLEAR & SMOOTH: Transparent screen protection; it’s like you have nothing there! The screen protector for iPad Pro 11 inch is made with 9H Screen hardness, offering maximum coverage for your screen including the front sensor
  • PERFECT PROTECTION: The tempered glass effectively protects your (iPad Pro 11 inches) from drops, scratches, scrapes, and fingerprint smudges
  • HIGH QUALITY: High-definition tempered glass clear screen coating protects against sweat and oil residue from fingerprints. Ultra-clear transparency to allow an optimal, natural viewing experience
  • EASY INSTALLATION: Bubble-free installation and no dirt on-screen when removed. You can learn the Install steps from the last picture and enjoy your mint-condition screen for years to come

entry.title: 10D - iPhone XS Max Tempered Glass (Edge to Edge Full Screen Coverage)
entry.summary:
Vendor: XpressTronics
Type: Tempered Glass
Price: 2.75

  • ANTI-FINGERPRINT OLEOPHOBIC COATING:  Precise laser cut tempered glass made with polished, rounded edges. 99.99% HD Clarity and Touchscreen Accuracy.
  • Extremely strong glass with a scratch-proof hard coated surface that will withstand forceful impacts and fully protect the screen beneath
  • Very easy installation is free of bubbles.
  • SAFETY GUARANTEE: Because Of the curved screen of the phone, it will not cover the full screen as tempered glass cannot be bend.
  • Prevents dust from entry and provides a smooth and naked screen experience, also, enhance compatibility with most cases.

entry.title: Samsung Galaxy S10 Tempered Glass (Full with Fingerprint Recognition)
entry.summary:
Vendor: XpressTronics
Type: Tempered Glass
Price: 0.99

  • High Durability and Quality: Our screen protector is made with premium glass that is built to last. Engineered for enhanced impact resistance to keep your phone safe and looking brand new. A surface hardness of 9H protects against scratches (keys, knives, etc...). Enjoy full-screen protection without compromising the beautiful display quality of your Galaxy S10 Plus. Ultra-thin size and case friendly with high transparency allow the screen protector to be non-intrusive while maximizing display quality.
  • Anti-Fingerprint Oil Coating: Contains oleophobic coating that reduces fingerprints from staying on your screen protector.
  • Bubble Free: Easy installation with wipes and dust-absorber included to prevent bubbles from forming. Simple and easy to use, providing you with a hassle-free installation experience.
  • Advanced Silicone Adhesion: Strong silicone adhesion provides powerful hold, keeping the screen protector attached and secured to your phone.
  • *Important: Resetting the fingerprint scanner is recommended in order for the screen protector to work with the scanner.

  • Surface Hardness: 9H

    A.S.F: ﻿Anti-Shatter Film

    Condition: New

  • 1 x Samsung Galaxy S10 Plus Tempered Glass Screen Protector

    1 x Wet and Dry Towel Wipes

    1 x Dust-Absorber Sticker

entry.title: Huawei P30 Lite Tempered Glass (Scratch Resistance And Smudge Free)
entry.summary:
Vendor: XpressTronics
Type: Tempered Glass
Price: 0.99

Cell Phone Theory Tempered Glass:

Cell Phone Theory brings for you a tempered glass that helps in protecting the screen of your phone. It comes with complete transparency which matches with your screen with no impact on a visual display.

Toughened glass:

The tempered glass is made using a toughened glass with 9H hardness which makes it durable and helps in giving long-lasting protection to your screen.

Safe:

In case of a severe drop or fall, the glass, if broken, will break into the small parts but stay in one-piece, making it safe for the screen of your phone.

Precise cutouts:

The tempered glass features precise cutouts for the phone openings, including the front camera of your device.

Scratch-Proof:

The tempered glass from Rexez protects your screen from daily scratches, dust, scrapes, and normal signs of wear and tear. It comes with a scratch-proof coating for durability. It is fingerprint-proof, dust-proof, washable, and tear-resistant. This tempered glass leaves no residue when removed.
